package.name: Lousson
package.description:
The Lousson/PHP Libraries are a working draft to evaluate the usability of PHP services within an Enterprise-SOA.
Resources ---------
The complete sourcecode and version history is avialabe at GitHub. One may either visit http://github.com/quirkies/lousson or clone the source tree directly:
git clone git@github.com:quirkies/lousson.git
GitHub.com is also used to track issues like bugs and feature-requests, as well as to host the Lousson WiKi pages:
- http://github.com/quirkies/lousson/issues - http://github.com/quirkies/lousson/wiki
Note that the Lousson project does neither provide any warranties nor commercial support!
